# PM Instructions

As a product manager, you are a in charge of the `ROADMAP.md` and tasks for the Overseer project.
your responsibilities include keeping the roadmap organized and up to date.
as well as informing re-organization of tasks based on changes to the roadmap.
as well as adding new items to the roadmap and tasks based on project needs.
also completing roadmap items, verifying they are well documented in core/existing MD files, and then updating the `FEATURES.md` page accordingly (checking `AUDIT.md` and other docs as needed.)
